Class CookieWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • CookieWorld
  • public class CookieWorld
extends greenfoot.World

    Credits

    Images

    • Background image from the original Cookie Clicker by Orteil, provided by caveman at https://wallpapercave.com/cookie-clicker-wallpapers
    • Cursor image provided by Tobias Ahlin Bjerrome at https://tobiasahlin.com/blog/common-mac-os-x-lion-cursors/
    • Spinning wheel of death provided by howdytom at https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/243675/location-of-the-resource-files-for-the-spinning-wait-cursor
    • Button object backgrounds provided by https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/wooden-buttons-ui-game_12632833.htm>wooden buttons
    • Remaining art created by Jonathan Zhao

    Code

    • SuperSmoothMover & Effect from Mr. Cohen
    • Label by Amjad Altadmri

    Sound

    • Click sound effect obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
    • Rocket sound effect obtained from https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/rocket/

    Music

    • Welcome/Menu background music: "Snowdin Town" by Toby Fox
    • Simulation background music: "Field of Hopes and Dreams" by Toby Fox
      Version:
      2022.11.23
      Author:
      Patrick Hu, Eddie Zhuang, Caden Chan, Jonathan Zhao

      • Constructor Detail

        • CookieWorld

          public CookieWorld​(greenfoot.GreenfootSound bgMusic,
                   int[] grandmas,
                   int[] clickers,
                   int[] speeds)
          CookieWorld constructor. Each array is of length 2. Index 0 = Player 1, index 1 = Player 2.
          Parameters:
          bgMusic - The background music
          grandmas - Number of starting grandmas for p1 and p2 respectively
          clickers - Number of clickers for p1 and p2 respectively
          speeds - Speeds for the clickers of p1 and p2 respectively

        • getOtherPlayer

          public Player getOtherPlayer​(Player thisPlayer)
          Returns the player that is NOT [Player thisPlayer]. E.g.: if p1 is passed in, return p2, and vice versa.
          Parameters:
          thisPlayer - The reference Player.
          Returns:
          Player The other player

        • getItemCost

          public int getItemCost​(Class itemClass)
          Returns the cost of [Class itemClass] by retrieving its [public static int COST] field

          Returns:

        • initBuyButtons

          public BuyButton[] initBuyButtons​(ArrayList<Class> itemClasses)
          Return an array of new `BuyButton`s, for each subclass in [Class[] itemClasses] (either `BUIDLING_CLASSES` or `POWERUP_CLASES`)
          Parameters:
          itemClasses - Array containing subclasses of Building or Powerup
          Returns:
          BuyButton[] Array of buttons for each subclass in `itemClasses`

        • getSabotageButton

          public BuyButton getSabotageButton​(Class sabotageClass)
          Return a BuyButton with the class of sabotageClass
          Parameters:
          sabotageClass - The subclass associated with the desired BuyButton
          Returns:
          BuyButton The BuyButton with the subclass of sabotageClass

        • getPlayerUpgradeButton

          public BuyButton getPlayerUpgradeButton​(Player player)
          Return the CookieUpgrade BuyButton associated with the player
          Parameters:
          player - The player whose button is being returned
          Returns:
          BuyButton The BuyButton that activates player's CookieUpgrade

        • toggleButton

          public void toggleButton​(BuyButton btn,
                         int cookieCount)
          Set button to active or inactive, depending on whether or not it can be afforded
          Parameters:
          btn - The BuyButton being checked
          cookieCount - If cookieCount is less than the button's cost, set to inactive; otherwise, set to active

        • toggleMilkBottlesButton

          public void toggleMilkBottlesButton()
          Special version of the toggleButton method, specifically to handle the MilkBottles sabotage

          Returns the amount of cookies a player needs to win

        • getAffordableBuildingButtons

          public ArrayList<BuyButton> getAffordableBuildingButtons​(int numCookies,
                                                         Player player)
          Returns an arraylist of all building BuyButtons that the player can afford, and that the player has space for
          Parameters:
          numCookies - The number of cookies the player has
          player - The player buying the buildings
          Returns:
          ArrayList The arraylist of BuyButtons

        • getAffordablePowerupButtons

          public ArrayList<BuyButton> getAffordablePowerupButtons​(int numCookies,
                                                        String name,
                                                        boolean cookieMaxed)
          Returns an arraylist of all powerup BuyButtons that the player can afford
          Parameters:
          numCookies - The number of cookies the player has
          player - The player buying the powerup
          cookieMaxed - Whether the player has already fully upgraded their cookie
          Returns:
          ArrayList The arraylist of BuyButtons

          Parameters:
          numCookies - The number of cookies the player has
          player - The player buying the sabotage
          Returns:

          public Player getP1()
